effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When one of the user's types would render it immune to damage, that type is ignored for damage calculation.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Negates the holder's type immunities. Ability immunities are not removed.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケモンの　タイプの　相性で
無効だった　技が
当たるように　なってしまう。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
Moves that normally have no effect
will land on a Pokémon holding it.

Se un Pokémon ha questo strumento, le mosse
che di norma non hanno effetto contro il suo tipo
vanno a segno.

Joya de un solo uso que potencia los
movimientos de tipo Siniestro. Debe llevarla
un Pokémon.

Attacken, die aufgrund der Wechselwirkungen
zwischen den Typen keine Wirkung haben,
treffen den Träger.

Un Pokémon tenant cet objet devient sensible
aux capacités autrement inefficaces en raison de
son type.

포켓몬 타입의 상성 때문에
무효였던 기술이
맞게 되어 버린다.

ポケモンの　タイプの　あいしょうで
むこう　だった　わざが
あたるように　なってしまう。

Moves that would otherwise have no
effect will land on the Pokémon that
holds it.

Moves that would otherwise have no
effect will land on the Pokémon that
holds it.

Un Pokémon tenant cet objet devient
sensible aux capacités autrement
inefficaces en raison de son type.
